summary: After waking up in a refrigerated meat locker, a man engages in a battle of wits with his captors, a group of Russian gangsters.
cast: Dylan McDermott|Yulia Snigir|Peter Facinelli|Andrey Ivchenko|David McNally|Mickey Milan|Markus Parilo|Rafael Petardi
keywords: freezer|die hard scenario|claustrophobic setting|locked in a freezer
title: Freezer
